mapper.insert: insert into order(member_seq, item_seq, order_address, order_Qty, order_status, order_create_date, order_cancel_date) values(#{memberSeq}, #{itemSeq}, #{orderAddress}, #{orderQty}, #{orderStatus}, #{orderCreateDate}, #{orderCancelDate})
mapper.select: select order_seq, member_seq, item_seq, order_address, order_qty, order_status, order_create_date, order_cancel_date from order as o join item as i on o.item_seq = i.item_seq where i.brand_seq = #{brandSeq}
